title: [Widow's Beach, Seashell Path]
description: Lush tropical foliage fades into white sands edged with tall coconut trees, and a narrow, lightly trodden path lined with seashells curves down the beach.  Barely visible amidst the dense greenery, a small vine-draped opening provides the only penetration deeper into the verdure, the sound of rapidly running water emanating from the other side.

Lush tropical foliage fades into white sands edged with tall coconut trees.  A narrow, lightly-trodden path curves down the beach lined with seashells.  The sound of running water can be heard on the other side of a dense opening.
